```{r}
# Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(bohemia)
```

```{r}
cols <- rainbow(nrow(mopeia_hamlets))
cols <- sample(cols, length(cols))
cols <- sample(cols, length(cols))

library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addPolygons(data = mopeia_hamlets,
              color = cols,
              popup = paste0(mopeia_hamlets$id,
                             ', Village: ',
                             mopeia_hamlets$village,
                             ', Locality:',
                             mopeia_hamlets$locality),
              weight = 1)

```
